skill.name: behaviors.skills.TransportACrowd
skill.description: To transport a entire 'Crowd' toward a given destination. This skill is specific to the Crowd object. Depending on its crowd transport capacity, agent will make as many round trips as necessary.

parameter.name: finalDestination
parameter.description: The destination where to transport the crowd.

link.name: reach
link.description: To enact the decision to "reach" the loading position or the final destination.

feedback.name: done
feedback.description: Sent when no more crowd's concenrtation left on the issued 'loadingPosition'.

feedback.name: failed
feedback.description: Sent if agent unit has no Crowd transport capability.
